post.author: 임기순
post.content:
I hope all is well with you since last we spoke. I have a client that is looking for a developer (can be .net or java or anything they have proprietary software there) ideally around the 70K mark for base salary, can start immediately and they need the proponent to have P&C insurance experience. If you can refer anyone on I’ll be most appreciative. Location is Toronto, Ontario.
I’ll continue to keep my eyes out for other roles for you as well.
Cheers,
Lucas Robbins | Business Manager Hays IT Suite#701 - 201 City Centre Drive | Mississauga, ON | L5B 2T4 Email: lrobbins@hays.ca | Direct 905 366 4527| Main 905 848 HAYS (4297) x 222 | Web www.hays.ca
post.title: Developer (PERM) - P&C insurance experience
